name: VATNOU
description:
USE Arrow Keys to Move!

Cartridge description:

VATNOU, the ultimate hyperaccelerated brain puzzler that punishes you for indulging yourself! Enjoy the legendary puzzle game that boasts the explosive popularity in the whole world, now finally appearing on your home console.

Made for "A game by its cover 2016" Jam.
